GoblinID.description:
Weaker than other brutes, but inexpensive.

Likes shiny things

VampireBatID.description:
Bats fly over tar pits and trapdoors below them and can even fly up through open trap doors.

Probably a vampire transformed into a bat.

GoblinShamanID.description:
All brutes within range will regenerate health. This regeneration does not stack with other goblin shamans.

He found a shiny thing so he put it on a stick.

SpiderID.description:
Spins webs to disable trapdoors permanently.

He kind of liked it in the dungeon but was running out of flies.

FlameImpID.description:
Immune to fire.

A lesser demon. He longs to bathe in the lava pits of his home again

CageGoblinID.description:
All lightning targeting brutes within range will be drawn to this. Immune to lightning.

He couldn't figure out how to get out of his cage so he uses it like a hamster ball

TrollID.description: The ultimate brute in terms of raw strength. Regenerates hitpoints.
